review_text: Great location, we were able to walk to everything. And a very nice apartment, with a great little deck on the roof. This was a perfect spot to enjoy downtown Keene for a weekend.
Hannah was an excellent host! Thank you so much.

This apartment is a little kooky in its location being that you have to walk across the roof to access it but the moment you step in it’s super clean and beautifully done. Every detail is well thought out. I really enjoyed staying there and it’s right by downtown. It was just the relaxing spot I needed.

I love Hannah’s place! It is so comfortable and I always feel right at home when I stay here. They just renovated the bathroom and the shower is beautiful! I always appreciate staying in such a squeaky clean place with nice linens.

We enjoyed our stay at Hannah's place! Hannah was very proactive with communication ahead of our stay which helped with a very smooth checkin process and made us feel like we could go to her for anything we needed throughout our stay. The apartment is incredibly spacious and accomodated our 3 guests perfectly. We were a little unsure about navigating up to the apartment at first and there was one icey night where it felt sketchy to walk across the rooftop even with the grip pads, but once inside we were able to relax and felt right at home!

Hannah's UpTop rooftop appartement was really exceeding our expectations. It is so spacious and nice decorated. Everything you want to have is there, even a special space for our yoga and tai chi exercises. The living room is a little bit cold so we did not spend time there. No problem: we like to spend time at the kitchen table. Keene is a nice town and the apartment is within walking distance of a really nice supermarket that sells organic locally produced food. In main street there a few nice restaurants.
We stayed two days longer than planned!

Our time at Hannah’s place was one of our favorite stays to date! We were wowed by how pristine, cozy and spacious the apartment was. It was quiet, private, and the rooftop location was quite straightforward to access. The kitchen had more dishes/utensils than needed for the maximum amount of guests allowed - usually we run into the opposite with most airbnbs. We enjoyed cooking in the kitchen, spending time in the living space and we wish we had time to play the many games available. There were so many thoughtful touches, such as lovely decor, free tea, coffee and snacks, and easy access with the keypad. There were even yoga mats for 4 and plenty of space to use them! Everything was so clean and tidy and we had no issues. Hannah sent clear instructions and great recommendations for dining before we even asked, too! The area was so cute and there was tons to do - we loved the speakeasy and went back twice. We would LOVE to come back! Thanks Hannah!

Hannah's place is unique, cute and very clean! It's in a great location for walking to restaurants and little shops. We appreciated the basket of snacks left for us and it had all the amenities we needed for a comfortable overnight. If you're traveling with young children, please heed the considerations Hannah has included. A parent would need to be very conscious about the rooftop area along with keeping the safety gate closed to the nook with the twin mattress as it has a steep stairwell. We had only our teenager so no concerns.
We will definitely consider staying here again in the future. Thank you, Hannah!

Such a great spot. Stayed here with our 2 year old daughter and the amount of space in the apartment was perfect. The apartment is in a great location and decorated so cozy and is updated. We would stay here again if were ever in Keene!
Our stay in Keene at this lovely apartment was great. It is a beautiful and comfortable space in the perfect location!

I had visited a friend this summer while they stayed at The Rooftop. I liked it so much, that I booked it as my first airbnb stay for my birthday weekend. I loved the cozy homey feeling of the unit but yet it has so much unique space to spread out and enjoy yourself!
Hannah was fantastic with communication without being intrusive. She made sure to answer any questions. The unit was extremely clean and inviting and was perfectly stocked with all items you’d need, as well as those you might not think of!
The rooftop is an ideal location to just get away and relax or go enjoy a night or two on the town :) I look forward to seeing what the new renovations will be at this already ideal space!!

If I could give Hannah’s place more than 5 stars I would!! I absolutely loved this space. It was so peaceful, private, clean and spacious. Communication was easy and Hannah was very helpful in every way. If I’m ever back in Keene, I’d definitely want to stay here again!
Great place to stay in Keene! At the top of the building, quiet, cozy and clean. Would come back again for a nearby ski trip!
This wasn’t my first time to stay at Hannah’s place. I love it here! I booked more stays for this year when I will be back in town.

This was my second time staying at Hannah’s rooftop, and it was my second time to love my stay! She just got a brand new washer and dryer that I was able to use, and I really appreciated that! I plan to stay here again in the next few months - I booked today to ensure it was available. I also loved that I could quickly walk to the restaurants and shops downtown.

We really enjoyed our stay in Hannah’s apartment. It was very easy to access with the simple instructions she sent us. The apartment was clean and matched all the pictures. There was plenty of space to hang out in the futon/TV room, kitchen, second living area with yoga mats and bean bags, and the bedroom. Kitchen was well stocked with utensils and dishes, and dishwasher was a great feature. Bathroom was clean and water was hot. My girlfriend loved the interior design and made sure to take lots of pics of everything. Would definitely reccomend based on cleanliness and proximity to an awesome downtown area.

Hannah’s place was absolutely perfect. We needed a getaway while visiting family for the holidays and Hannah’s place served as the perfect sanctuary from the open floor plan to the board games and books, we had a ton of space to relax and enjoy some quiet time. They even put out sand on the walkway on one of the colder nights when some puddles iced over. Great place, great host!

Our trip was just a brief overnight stay in Keene.
The apartment was very clean and had everything you might need for a short visit.
Overall, very happy with the accommodations.

Such an amazing space in Keene - walkable to downtown, amazingly clean, unique, full of character and quiet. I will stay here whenever I need to lodge in keene and so happy to have found this space. Hannah was easy to communicate with and made the check in and check out seamless.
Hannah’s place is wonderful!! Clean, beautiful, cozy, inviting. Will definitely be back!

I loved this space! Squeaky clean and nice linens. I also loved the yoga space! It was so nice to be able to work out at “home” - she even had 5 lb hand weights. Extremely close to the downtown area and great restaurants. I enjoyed it so much, I booked 8 additional nights for next month when I will be back for work.
As mentioned. Spacious apartment in the center of the town. Hostess was extremely responsive.
great place
Great stay after a long night of partying at a wedding. Hannah was a great host and the place was AMAZING!!!! Highly recommend if you want a night out in Keene!!

We really enjoyed our 2 nights stay at Hannah’s listing. Its conveniently located and everything you will need is within walking distance. The space was open and bright which sets a very relaxing environment. I would most definitely stay here again!

Wow! This was one of the best experiences I’ve ever had on Airbnb. Hannah was so friendly and helpful. I found the property easily, thanks for her detailed instructions. The apartment was incredibly spacious and clean. I couldn’t believe how quiet it was during the day and night.
It was the perfect home away from home. I will absolutely be back!
I love this place. Cozy, family friendly, and just very inviting!
Fabulous uptown airbnb with all the amenities you will ever need. Private entrance, separate parking, super clean and neat airbnb. Highly recommended for short and long term stays! Will be back!
Great little place! We loved it. Would come back.

Beautiful, clean and airy space with 3 bedrooms, perfect for a family with two kids. The towels are soft, the sheets are crisp, the kitchen is well appointed, the neighborhood is peaceful, and the house is just a few minutes from Main Street. My 80-year-old mother was charmed by the place and my 15-year-old daughter declared it was the kind of place she wanted to live after college.

We were in Keene for a wedding that happened to coincide with the Pumpkin Festival. Parking in town was not to be had, but it didn't matter.
Hannah's property put us within walking distance of everything. Her descriptions of the local color and restaurants were right on...and the space was wonderfully and tastefully done. Except that it rained every day (which wasn't Hannah's fault!), we loved our stay and look forward to returning.

We LOVED our stay in Keene! Easy to follow instructions, a seamless keypad code to get in, and the place was fantastic. Everything was spotless, the decor was so cute, and the place was even bigger than what I expected. The bed was comfortable and the area was very safe and walkable. Our only regret was not staying here longer. We’d love to come back soon!

I had a wonderful 2-day stay at Hannah's place. The moment I entered the apartment I felt right at home: it is tastefully decorated, has everything needed for a comfortable stay, extremely clean, and overall welcoming. You can walk to town with shops and restaurants in just a few minutes and there is also a large grocery store very close to the apartment. I loved the yoga/meditation room and made sure to use it. Hannah's communication was prompt and friendly. I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a nice and relaxing getaway which is still close to a town.

We met Hannah on checking out. She was super helpful, very friendly and we enjoyed talking with her. The place is great and she is renovating. We will definitely want to come back. The unit had MANY extra touches and she is very generous.
A great night and we wished we had booked it again on our way home.

We had such a great stay at Hannah’s place! Everything was exactly as pictured and above and beyond our expectations! Sadly, we were only staying one night, but we loved the walkability and convenience to the square. Hannah thought of everything; the roof top space was well appointed with a comfy seating area, great book selections, comfortable and clean linens, and it was SO spacious! On top of that, Hannah was very responsive and super friendly. Thanks for a wonderful stay in Keene!

This place was amazing. Super clean, cute, and there was even a basket of welcome goodies and a yoga space 🧘‍♀️❤️. The bed was super comfortable and the location was right next to an adorable downtown square. We stayed here on our last night and were wishing that we could have stayed longer. Will be booking this again if I’m ever back in Keene.
Beautiful place, very large, high ceiling, lots of light. Great location a short walk from the main drag with lots of restaurants. Very responsive host. Highly recommend.

Hannah’s little rooftop apartment is quirky and adorable!! It was definitely bigger than I anticipated, and didn’t feel cramped or confined whatsoever.
Her place is a work in progress, but it still felt homey and I can wait to see how she renovates.
Please don’t take away that one of a kind charm
(And sit in the poof chairs! They are surprisingly comfy!)
Perfect place and location to enjoy Keene’s Main Street!
Great location and fantastic space! Hannah's place was larger than expected and very convenient to downtown. The stairs to the apartment are wide, covered, and well lit. Would stay again!

My colleague and I chose Hannah's apartment for a business trip. We loved being close to all of the amenities of downtown Keene and found the apartment to be spacious, clean, comfortable and relaxing.
Hannah was a great host, communicative and accommodating. We would highly recommend.

Great one night stay after hiking nearby with some friends.. We were able to walk 3 minutes to a restaurant for dinner and had a nice evening in the apt. Kitchen was well stocked and we appreciated the candy for the hike we were off to do after check out. If you are looking for a place to do some yoga, there is a great space and props to practice.. Beautiful place!
Hannah’s place was perfect. Will likely stay here again.
Great spot. Very close / walkable to everything in keene. Hannah was great
Hannah’s place was great. Super cute, comfortable, and homey. Great for our weekend trip. Exactly like the pictures. Walking distance so many things. Would stay again!
Quaint and cozy! Highly recommend
Hannah’s place exceeded our expectations and we loved that it was in walking distance to downtown. Hope to return again soon.

One of the nicest places I've ever stayed. The location was an absolute dream to be able to walk to Keen Music Fest, but even on a day there aren't dozens of performances, to be able to walk to great restaurants and shops would be nice.
There was an amazing view from the deck, and the apartment had nice big windows for lots of light and air.
The futon was super comfy and all the amenities - sheets, towels, coffee, were great. Everything was in great condition and so pretty.
My only regret was a didn't give myself a chance to try the extra large bathtub.

This apartment is amazing! I stayed for a few weeks while visiting family and I really can’t say enough good things about it. The location is fantastic. It’s like a 30 second walk to Main Street with all of the shops and restaurants, but yet it’s incredibly quiet. The apartment itself is huge. I loved the yoga space (Hannah even provides yoga mats!) The whole space has a very laid back vibe to it, very relaxing. It has pretty much everything you will need during your stay. Check in was a breeze and the place was spotless. Hannah is awesome- very responsive, very nice. I highly recommend this place if you’re coming to Keene and I would 100% stay here again.

This is a quirky and delightful place to stay in Keene. It’s close to everything, easy to find and its quirkiness (across a roof to the front door, railroad flat layout) makes it very fun. We didn’t have time for yoga but appreciated the space and equipment.
You won’t believe how spacious this property is! Well appointed. Safe, convenient location. Perfect for our quick stay in Keene. Couldn’t recommend the apartment more.
A little oasis tucked away on the top floor. Beautifully and thoughtfully decorated, super clean and organized, with a very serene feel to it. Can highly highly recommend.
We loved our stay at Hannah’s beautiful property. It was very clean and comfortable, and the perfect location for having fun in Keene. We are looking forward to staying there again in the future!
Shower and tub need work other than that a dream come true!
great view of the moon the night we stayed. close walking to town. roomy and clean. great bed.
The apartment is beautiful decorated and always a very peaceful stay. I recommended Hannah’s rental to all.
This was a great little place, if we go back to NH we’ll definitely be staying again!

Everything as described in the write-up. Close to Main Street and excellent restaurant and bar scene (check out the speak-easy). Place is surrounded by an apartment/condo complex that pulls a little away from the rustic charm but it’s still a nice, comfortable place in a attractive town. My wife enjoyed it and when that happens, life is easy.

What an absolutely lovely space! So pretty and thoroughly stocked with everything we needed. Hannah made everything so easy and straightforward. We’d love to stay again and I can’t recommend it enough!

Hannah's place was really incredible, great location, really nice decor, and organization. plenty of space. I loved walking to dinner and the market easily. The Fireworks restaurant was so good! Highly recommend. The only downside was the difficulty in cooling down the sleeping area with this hot summer weather even with AC units and fans provided. I would absolutely return to this amazing Airbnb in cooler weather.
It was last minute, Hannah quickly made sure the place was ready. Beautiful apartment in a good location, very clean and quiet.
This rooftop retreat was exactly what we needed for our friend's wedding weekend. Location was perfect and the place was simply adorable!
Value well above cost. Beautiful rental in a beautiful setting and a fun college town
Amazing, cute and super clean! We wished we could have stayed longer!
Hannah’s place was great! Very central to downtown and walkable. It’s super cute - light and airy, very roomy and clean! 10/10 would love yo stay again!
The apartment was very clean and in a walkable location. The beds were comfortable and the bedding was clean. Hannah was very responsive kind. I would highly recommend her place!
It was such a lovely apartment to rent complete with a yoga corner and basics like coffe, tea, honey, spices. Everything was beautifully decorated and well thought out. I’d stay there again!

We can not say enough about how wonderful the apartment was - beautifully decorated with a fully equipped kitchen, sparkling clean and spacious. The location was perfect - close to restaurants and main streets. The bed was comfortable and the neighborhood was quiet in the evening. Hannah was wonderful, flexible, easy to contact and responsive . We highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Keene. This is one of the nicest places we have stayed since we joined Airbnb 10 years ago.
The place was great and spotless. And, Hannah couldn’t have been nicer. I look forward to staying again.
This rooftop apartment is exactly as it appears — bonus great books and yoga space! Lovely little touches. Comfortable beds. Excellent location.
The yoga materials were the cherry on the cake. We enjoyed the space and relaxing by having a yoga session before bed.
Hannah’s spot is a dream! Cozy, comfortable, and an excellent location. The bed was so comfy and the space very inviting and clean- would love to stay again!
Had a great stay! Will use Hannah’s space again in the future.

Hannah’s place was an excellent choice of location for us during our stay in Keene. The town square was a stone throw away, which provided some great places to eat. The apartment itself was perfectly decorated and spacious. Hannah herself was also a very responsive host. We plan to book again when we visit Keene next time.

Beautiful, sunny, peaceful space. Looks/is just like the photos. Nice linens. Spotless. Nice welcoming touches like a small basket with an assortment of snacks and tea, honey, coffee and creamer. Very close to Main Street and many decent restaurants but tucked away so it’s quiet. We appreciated the room darkening curtain tucked behind the pretty curtains in the bedroom. Hannah was very responsive. Arrival was easy with a key code. We appreciated the breakfast recommendation for Brewbakers. It was delicious.

We really enjoyed our stay in Keene. The apartment was very spacious. Loved the fact that a few snacks were left for us to enjoy. Hannah recommended a restaurant for supper -and we thoroughly enjoyed our meal. Hannah was great to communicate with and we would happily stay at her place again.
We loved spending the weekend here! The loft is airy, comfortable, and spotlessly clean. Beds were very comfortable. Great place to hang!
Nice set up in a nice spot. Hannah accommodated us even though it was a last minute request. Would highly recommend!
hannah’s place was beautiful and i loved the location, walked to the coffee shop nearby every morning. decorated perfectly too felt very cozy
Great place to stay in Keene. It was clean, comfortable and the host was responsive to all our questions. Would stay there again.

The place was beautiful, it was in a great location and within walking distance to a lot of great restaurants.
The place itself was spacious and felt really homie. Will definitely book again the next time I visit.

Hannah was a very good host. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. Hannah's communication was clear and complete. The kitchen was well stocked with tea and coffee and a few extra treats which was appreciated. The location of the apartment is perfect for visiting Keene!

This place is incredibly beautiful! It’s a great mix of old fashioned charm with the beams and hardwood floors, with modern amenities and decor. It’s very bright and airy. Great parking in the back, with plenty of room and a little away from the road. I love that I could walk two blocks to restaurants and cafes. The Colonial theater is about a four minute walk! I definitely recommend. I also love that Hannah left water, drinks, and a few snacks! Very thoughtful. The linens provided were very high quality. There is a huge space for yoga if you’re into that. It’s a beautiful and peaceful spot. It also has a great outdoor space to enjoy during the warm months. I definitely recommend!
Very beautiful unit. Big patio space! Lots of character to the space, but still had all the modern amenities!

Absolutely perfect spot - close to so many things, immaculate, tasteful and provided a calm and comfortable stay. Hannah was friendly, helpful and offered some great advice on the area. I hope to stay again sometime - would highly recommend!

Hannah's place was perfect for our short stay in Keene. We wish we could have stayed longer to explore more of the area. The pictures are exactly what the place looked like in person. Lots of room, very clean and open. We loved the yoga area and thought it was the highlight of the space.
Wonderful place - super relaxing and comfortable and very close to restaurants and bars. It was perfect for a quick getaway for the weekend. We will definitely be back!
exelent place near to everything you need
Wonderful place, very fun and unique. Perfect for our kids. Great location, wonderfully positioned in town near major restaurants. Highly recommend.
Lovely apartment right near downtown Keene. Was very clean and had everything my family and I needed during our stay!

Beautiful, private, spacious apartment, super clean, lots of character, and in a great location. Short walk to good food, shopping, and coffee. Hannah was very responsive and directions about everything were clear.
Great location, walkable to town with lots of restaurants, super clean and minimalist airbnb with homey conveniences. Highly recommend.
Beautiful space, quiet but walking distance to downtown. The apartment is really spacious and we appreciated how Hannah left out snacks and candy in the kitchen 😊
Hannah was an excellent host. All the little touches, from snacks and tea to great linens and an easy vibe this place was perfect for my family of 4! I would definitely stay here again.
Beautiful and comfortable great location

Was peaceful getaway. The minimalistic stylings of the apartment were delightful, the apartment is huge, the pictures don’t do it justice. Super close to restaurants in the downtown scene. Had a great time.

can walk to numerous restaurants and things to do. wish we could have stayed longer. I have a certified service dog so when searching, this place came up under pet friendly - DO NOT BRING DOGGOS. Cleaner is allergic and very much not the vibe. if my dog didn’t stay by my side and trained i would be nervous about the decor (hence why my other dog doesn’t travel with me 😅) entirely understandable and despite the confusion, communication was breezy. There are stairs but they are well lit with cameras and not isolated. I did not feel in danger whatsoever. highly recommended to friends.
We had a great stay. Place was really nice and very much aligned with the photos posted. We enjoyed the yoga equipment and how close to town this place was. We would absolutely come back!
Loved it here, the place is great and everything was super easy!
Thank you for the wonderful stay ! We hope to stay there again in the future !
Very cute apartment with lots of the basics. Perfect!
Highly recommend - really nice host and an absolutely wonderful space.
Hannah was an amazing host and made us feel right at home. The place was extremely clean and beautiful. I will definitely be staying again.
Amazing place!!! Hidden gem! Wish we could have stayed longer, but will definitely be back!

Very happy with choice of Hannah’s BNB. Walking distance to everything in downtown Keene. Place was well organized, spacious and comfortable. All amenities as described. This location is super safe. Sleeps four adults if needed as long as some are cool sleeping on a futon. Will be my first BNB I look for next time I’m in town 👍
Such a lovely space to stay in if you are planning a trip to Keene. It is exactly as described and checking in/out was a breeze! Highly recommend!

Hannah’s place was amazing, very comfortable and styled perfectly. Perfect location and very cozy with a modern and artistic feel, visiting keene somewhat frequently I plan on this being my go to place to stay.
The place is even more beautiful in person! Incredibly spacious, clean, and peaceful. Hannah is super responsive, flexible, understanding, and friendly. I couldn't recommend staying here more.
Hannahs air bnb was decorated beautifully and very zen. She was also so attentive with any and all information. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay!
Adorable apartment. Super comfortable bed.

Hannah's place checks all the BnB boxes - Clean, comfortable, quiet, all the amenities and at a fair price. What sets it apart is the wonderfully unique space. Hannah has done a remarkable job transforming this 3rd floor space into something that makes for a memorable stay. Among all the pitched architectural features are a variety of very well composed living spaces. It's walking distance to a revitalized Main Street. Enjoyed Modestman Brewing in particular. Parking was great, access easy and Hannah was an extraordinary host.

Not a good place for 4 adults. Truly can sleep two adults and two children. The staircase up to the apartment door is fine but I would not walk up there alone as a female. Make sure there are multiple people walking up the stairs especially late at night. It seems like a good place to be mugged. Pricey apartment for only one bed. Place was very clean and Hannah was a good host.
This was a really nice, spacious, comfortable and clean place. Hannah was a great host and really enjoyed the stay!
Very clean and large, relaxing place to stay. Easy access to downtown Keene. Lots of little treats left if wanted-would recommend for any young couple looking to stay in Keene area.
Great place to stay!
Hannah space was wonderful!! Close to downtown but quiet and relaxing. She was a wonderful host!
Best air bnb I ever stayed in!!!!
Very nice and clean accommodation, I recommend it to anyone visiting Keene. The host was excellent!
Hannah’s space was absolutely perfect! Clean, convenient, easy check in… wish we could have stayed longer as we thoroughly enjoyed it. Highly recommend!!

Awesome spot, so close to downtown! The apartment was super clean, very warm and inviting, accommodating and spacious for a one bedroom. Hannah’s instructions and resources were clear and helpful, enhancing our groups experience. Thank you Hannah!
Great place!

We had a great stay at “Up Top” apartment. The apartment was so close to downtown Keene and was beautifully decorated. The bed was very comfortable and we enjoyed the views from the rooftop. We would definitely stay here again!
Lovely stay! The apartment was clean, in a great location (easy to bar hop) and very well maintained.
The space was amazing. Very clean and huge! We will absolutely be staying here next time we come back to Keene.

We arrived in Keene in the late evening and were looking for a place to stay. Then we came across Hannah's beautiful apartment. Even late hour we had completed the booking within a few minutes. Thank you!!!
Smelled great, clean, and cozy. Amazing experience.
Perfect little apartment in downtown Keene. Clean and bright with everything we needed. Hannah was great at communicating during our stay.
Great space!
Neat apartment; great location
This apartment is so right for anyone looking for a spacious and open floor plan. The place is light and bright. The apartment is in a great location.
Beautiful, bright apartment. Very clean and comfortable. Highly recommend!
Wonderful condo!! Very clean, spacious and comfortable. We so loved our stay and walking distance to all the stores and cafes in Keene. Host was great. Highly recommend. We can’t wait to return!
Listing is just as pictured. Within walking distance to main street. We enjoyed delicious meals at Luca’s and the Stage. Also did a nice hike at the Horatio Colony Preserve

Hannah’s airbnb was truly perfection. It was spotless, perfectly laid out and the bed was incredibly comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked for cooking meals and there were plenty of towels and products in the bathroom. We used this as a place to get ready for our wedding and it was perfect. Thank you, Hannah! We’ll be back.

In the top three AirBnBs of our travel history.
Spacious, clean, quiet, unique, with a great ambience and atmosphere. Easy walking distance for the downtown amenities.
Thanks to Hannah for great hosting!

What a wonderful stay! Although it was a short visit while getting our daughter settled in at school we quickly fell
In love with the charm and location. We will definitely be back to stay with Hannah the next time we visit!
Great communicator and everything was as promised!
Great stay! Everything was clean & the apartment was in a great location!

We had a great stay at George's place. It was a great spot for the two of us while we were in town for a wedding. This was definitely a great hotel alternative, just what we were looking for. We appreciated all the information about the area and were sad to not have much time to explore. Definitely recommended.
Enjoyed. Will stay there next visit to the area.
Quiet, relaxing space. Perfect for what we needed:)
George was very fast with communication! It was a lovely place to stay. highly recommend if you are ever in the Keene area.

Georges place was perfect while we were visiting family in Keene! It was absolutely spotless, and such a charming apartment! We have an infant so it was nice to be in such a quiet neighborhood. Also such a quick walk to downtown Keene. Will definitely be staying here again!
This was my second stay here and it was just as good as the first. Thank you for creating such a welcoming place to land!
This was a great place and we enjoyed our stay in keene
Very functional space and a Great launchpad to enjoy all that Keene has to offer!
perfect! clean, cute, cozy, as described, and fantastic walkable location
great stay!

My husband and I had a great stay at George’s apartment. It is spacious, beautifully appointed, clean, and filled with sunlight! Great selection of books to peruse, a little something for everybody. Bed was very comfortable. The apartment is in a great location, short walk to lots of great places to eat. George’s recommendations for places to try were spot on. Check in was quick and easy. We will definitely stay at George’s place when visiting Keene n the future.
We've stayed with George quite a few times now and continue to have a great experience! This time around we were going to be a bit early so we coordinated with George to check in early with ease!
As described!
The place was nice and cozy for a short weekend, easy to travel to downtown and explore the sites

George is a wonderful host and was very responsive to any questions or concerns we had. We loved the location but the kitchen is what stood out to us the most we loved the green tiles on the kitchen floor, the tile pieces on the wall were beautiful, and the chalk board of recommendations to local places to get food and drinks. This apartment also brings in so much natural sunlight during the day which I appreciated.
Such a cute apartment! Location was very close to everything we needed over the weekend. Very clean and the checkin was completely a breeze.

Nice place. Spacious and very comfortable. Awesome decor.
We were there during the winter but I could easily see a summer stay in this area. I could easily see coming back here.
nice place.

George’s place was close to downtown and it is a walkable area. The apartment allowed for a lot of sunlight and was quiet. The apartment had a small book collection which was a nice touch. Photos represent home and description accurate. The recommendations came in handy during our stay. We enjoyed Brewbakers in the mornings and Machina for drinks. Stonewall Farm was a nice area to walk around even during the winter. They have a few farm animals, trails and quiet/serene.

The apartment was just as described. It was much more spacious than even the pictures made it seem. Bed was very comfortable and kitchen was larger than I thought and led to a nice balcony. I would definitely stay here again.
I had a brief but great stay at George’s place. Would totally recommend and would come back here in a heartbeat, if in the area. ￼
This was a great stay! George is a wonderful host because of his laid back attitude and generosity! Thanks, I'll be back next time I'm in Keene!
Great apartment! Convenient, well appointed, and an all around lovely place to stay!
great stay!

I was only in town for the night, but I had a wonderful stay and appreciated the homelike feel of the place while still being unique. George was also super responsive and I appreciate his flexibility as I had to reschedule my stay due to illness. George was very understanding. I would love to stay here again for longer!

Georges place was exactly the experience I was hoping for- from an easy check in to a close walk to downtown, the location was perfect. The home was tidy and had great touches- I felt taken care of and like I had everything I needed! Definitely recommend for either short term or extended stays.
This is the second time we've stayed at George's place and we were pleased as punch both times! We would likely stay here again in the future.
Awesome location, will definitely book again!
All the makings of a perfect AirBnB! The kitchen is amazing for those who like to save and cook while traveling. I love how private the stay was as well as excellent instructions via the app!
George's place was very well situated, spacious, and had everything we needed! Thanks for a great stay in Keene.
Clean, comfortable and such a cute space! Great location, would come back and stay again!
Another fantastic stay at George's place in Keene! A consistently wonderful place to stay when visiting the area and hope to return soon!

I was there for 6 weeks and couldn't fault anything and will definitely stay again when in Keene

Beautiful apartment, very cleaned and wonderfully decorated. Kristin and Marty are the best hosts from the woodworking in the apartment, to the local suggestions. I will be recommending their place to anyone visiting Keene in the future. Loved it here!

Sparkling clean, cozy, comfy, a true home away from home. Our younger son graduated from Keene in 2017 and still lives there. We have been to many Airbnb’s in town; Kristen and Marty’s place tops them all! We will be back!
Kristin and Marty & their place was fantastic and just what we needed. If we are ever in Keene again, we know exactly where to stay!

Kristen and Marty have a beautiful space that was beautiful, cozy, and quiet. All of us were amazed at how beautiful the apartment was and how thoughtful Kristen and Marty were. Definately one of the nicest places we'be ever been in!
This is a wonderful place to stay. Kristin and Marty made the place feel like home. We absolutely enjoyed our time and hope to see them again in the future!

Kristin and Marty were great hosts for a fabulous apartment. They were very accommodating, great communicators, and thoughtful hosts. We visited in the Christmas season and opened the door to find a Christmas tree and poinsettias as well as holiday napkins and candy. It was a beautiful, comfortable, pristine apartment with a well equipped kitchen and many special touches. We had a wonderful visit and are appreciative of their great hospitality.

From the moment we booked with Kristin and Marty we were in good hands with expeditious responses to our inquiries. We arrived to find their skillfully-renovated apartment spick and span with gleaning wooden floors and a television with access to Netflix, HBO plus and more. The space was well heated with ceiling fans that will be great additions for the summer. The fridge had cream cheese for the bagels they’d left for us on the counter next to the stocked coffee maker. We enjoyed our stay tremendously and left with two bags of freshly baked cookies from Kristin for the ride home. Thanks so much for a great visit.

Kristen & Martys’ place was an extremely cozy and comfortable apartment that was well-stocked with amenities. From the comfy beds to the new furniture—some of which the host made by hand—the place was full of charm and comfort. The hosts were friendly and very responsive to our needs. We strongly recommend this B&B experience.
wonderful space with wonderful hosts! 13 min from downtown Keene! it was clean and quiet and a great way to relax!

We had a wonderful stay in Kristin and Marty’s place. It is delightful: warm and cozy, with plenty of space and beautiful structural details, and it’s a short walk into town for great meals. My friend and I were having some ‘girls’ time’ away from family and work responsibilities. The living room and desk/sitting room offer different spots for hanging out and relaxing. The space could easily accommodate two couples (2 rooms with big beds), or be a nice work retreat if someone was seeking a place to write. Everything seemed brand new, sparkling clean, and much of the space was created by hand by Marty and Kristin—a true labor of love that guests now get to enjoy. Keurig coffee available at all times; pastry treats offered our first morning; quick replies on all correspondence. Truly wonderful hosts and a wonderful getaway. It’s a quick walk into town for dinner: we particularly liked The Stage (good food and great cocktails). Hoping to run away for another weekend sometime! We’ll be sure to stay with Kristin and Marty if they aren’t booked up already.
What a wonderful stay!! Strongly recommend to anyone thinking about visiting Keene

Beautiful, clean and comfortable...a truly wonderful experience, upon arrival we felt so at home. Kristin and Marty have done an amazing job...definitely will be back. If you are looking to stay in Keene, this should be at the top of your list.

When we reserved a month in advance, we took a chance on a new place that didn't yet have reviews, and we are so glad we did. Kristen and Marty recently renovated the space and were friendly and welcoming. They even provided fresh bagels and cream cheese, a welcome surprise. There's a Keurig with coffee and cocoa. The kitchen had space to store our groceries and came equipped with everything we needed. We could have cooked all our meals there, but we enjoyed the half-mile walk to town to local restaurants for dinner.
The apartment was so clean and new-looking that we wondered if we were the first guests, but no, others had signed the guestbook and left glowing comments. Kristin and Marty clearly take pride in giving their guests a spotless and nicely decorated place to stay.
One warning: you do need to climb a flight of steep stairs, and since the apartment was once an attic, there are some low ceilings. My family members and I are short so this wasn't a problem, but very tall people might not prefer it.
Overall, we were delighted. If you're looking for a place in Keene, the second floor of Kristin and Marty's home makes a great apartment.

Kristin and Marty’s place was something out of a better homes and gardens magazine. It looked like Joanna Gaines decorated herself! So adorable from the welcome sign saying welcome heather and friends to the bagels left for us to enjoy in the morning. If I lived in Keene I would want to live there. Short walk to down town as well! Loved it here, highly recommended!

Kristin and Marty's place is fabulous. My family and I were in town for the Clarence Demar marathon and couldn't have found a better place to stay. The apartment was sparkling clean and had everything we needed. Kristin and Marty even gave us some bagels and fruit for the race. I highly recommend their place!

If you're going to stay anywhere in, or around Keene NH, then you should stay here! My girlfriend and I came over from London to visit some family nearby, and Kristin and Marty's place was truly fantastic.
It's a really comfortable and private apartment, perfectly located within walking distance of Keene's vibrant main street, with plenty of restaurants, bars and shops nearby.
Everything in the apartment was thoughtfully laid out and stylishly finished to a very high standard. The kitchen and living areas are well equipped and spacious. The apartment could comfortably accommodate at least four people, though there were only the two of us staying.
Kristin and Marty are warm, welcoming, attentive hosts - and lovely people! They had added some great personal touches, and were very kind to be flexible for us. It was a wonderful retreat and definitely great value for money.
Cannot recommend this place enough. Thanks Kristin and Marty for a great stay!

Kristin and Marty were such amazing hosts - and their home was stunning. New EVERYTHING! Beautiful space with so much attention to detail. They even baked us cookies!
On our next visit to Keene we’ll be sure to stay again.
Thank you!!
Our stay was fabulous. With family members that live apart it was great to have a space where we could all gather together to celebrate my daughter’s wedding weekend together.

We absolutely loved Christina’s home! They have truly thought of every detail from clearly labeling the cabinets to make finding things easy to providing games, books and TV for entertainment. The beds were very comfy! We felt at home right away. Perfect spot for small groups or large families with privacy AND fun community spaces.

This was a beautiful home, exactly what my team and I needed! Christina and her cohosts were very communicative and even baked a delicious banana bread for us. Thank you for a wonderful stay in Keene.

Great house for family,
location perfect for Keene town centre and college nearby, has plenty of character
hosts were awesome, thank you

Our stay at Christina’s and sister’s place was pretty near perfect. Homey and beautifully decorated We needed a place for family get together that would mimic home and their place delivered …with lots of lovely extras. Squeaky clean, nice loaf of delicious banana bread to greet us. An unexpected snow storm arrived overnight and our hosts were so great about getting a snow machine and snow guru to dig out our cars. Hoping to make this a biannual space for family get togethers in the future.. maybe without the snow. Love the town also

Everything about this place was perfect for our stay. We used the house as a base for my family (grown kids and their SOs) while in Keene for my mom’s 90th. So in and out a lot. The house was precisely as described, spotlessly clean, homey and well supplied, and the common areas were great for our late evening chats. We loved our stay here.

Christina's house was perfect for our stay in Keene. We were greeted with a freshly baked banana bread which was delicious!! Our family was in town for a funeral which did not leave us much time for fun, but the house was very comfortable and had everything we needed for our stay. I would love to stay again when we are in the area.
We had a great stay in Keene and this home was wonderful. It had everything we needed right down to fresh banana bread when we arrived. We highly recommend this home
Such a magical, delightful gem in the heart Keene. Can’t wait to come back.
Great house with well appointed amenities. Warm surroundings great for a family or a friend’s reunion!

This beautiful retreat has become our favorite family gathering spot. Christina and Heather are accommodating, kind, and quick to respond. It’s fun exploring the many rooms. So many nooks full of wonderful things to discover. Comfortable seating and beds (heavenly king size mattress). Granddaughters love the studio. It’s their sanctuary when we’re there (one wants to buy the house when she grows up). Well equipped kitchen, and labeled cabinets and drawers make it so easy to find things. Dishes and glassware are pretty and fun. The unexpected extra touches throughout the house are so appreciated and add to the home away from home feeling. Nice neighborhood and close to town. We enjoyed many walks into town, to check out the stores, get fancy coffee, or eat. I could go on and on about this house. We just love it so much.

Loved every moment staying at Christina's! So close to Downtown walking isn't a problem! Enjoyed being close to parks and trails and being able walk around the neighborhood looking at the beautiful old homes! Christina had the house planned out so well, we never had to wonder where anything was or how to change the temperature. It felt vey much a home and myself and my in-law were very sad when it was time to leave. We hope to visit again many more times in the future! Keene is a wonderful place! May have even inspired my in-laws to move there from Oklahoma. I can't say enough, it was magical!

There are some places that one stays in that feel nice or are beautiful, etc,. and there are others that ALSO make you feel cared for and that inspire conversation and promote well being. Christina’s home does that and more. There are quiet corners to work, crafts to create with, intimate spaces for reading and a walkable area that gets you outdoors into wonderful NH days and evenings. This home makes you feel that all is right with the world.

This place was a perfect location for a small get together with friends. Very well kept, everything was clearly labeled and accessible, just an absolutely charming house all around! Perfect location in walking distance of central Keene. The host went above and beyond to address any and all needs we had. Would absolutely stay here again!

So perfect for our family trip. Everything was labeled and easy to find. The decor was personal but so interesting and to at. The porch area, dining room, and living room made it easy to have group time, chat with each other, and plenty of area to your own time!! Location perfect our events and for coffee and dining and shopping. We wouldn'tchange a thing!!

Family and friends of mine met at Christina’s beautiful house to visit my daughter and enjoy Keene. The house was updated, cozy , peaceful and very clean with many different rooms for people to gather together in and also spread out in for some alone time after a busy day. I love the screened in patio area as well.
There were many amenities and the drawers and cabinets were labeled, which made it easy to locate things. The walk to the town and restaurants was about 0.5 miles which was very convenient for us.
I would love to stay at this home again and highly recommend it to others.
It’s a great quite place to unwind!
Third time staying here and perfect. Thank you!!!

This was a fun and beautiful place to stay. Very clean, comfortable, with some really fun spaces, the house has a lot of character. There was plenty of room for six of us. Christina and her sisters were very helpful. They responded very quickly and were very accommodating. We highly recommend!
This is the second time my seven friends and I stayed here! Both times were fabulous, thank you so much!

We had a gathering of old friends, and the house easily accommodating all of us. The kitchen is well equipped and all the cabinets are labelled making it easy to work in an unfamiliar kitchen. The large screened-in porch was ideal for hanging out in the evening.
Loved our stay here! Everyone had space to themselves and there were so many options for communal spaces. The house is gorgeous, couldn't have loved it more!

This place is an absolute gem. Gorgeously decorated...probably the most beautiful air b&b I've stayed at. So many special touches to make it more welcoming and comfortable. Things like homemade chocolate chip banana bread in the fridge, tons of books in the library, soft cozy throw blankets everywhere including the patio furniture on the screened in porch, amazing linens, and comfortable beds.
Great location a 10 minute or less walk to downtown. Traveling with kids we especially loved being just around the corner from 2 playgrounds.
The hosts were incredible!

We felt right at home! All communication was superb. The setting was peaceful, yet easy access to a bustling downtown. The porch and dining are was ideal for having friends over for dinner and visiting. It was clean and clutter free and had the cutest labels. Thank you for a delightful stay in Keene, NH!
Really cool house and great location. Christina and others were accommodating and really helpful. Would 100% recommend staying here and we’ll be back for sure!

Great place! Perfect for our family! Christina was very responsive! We so appreciated the home- made banana cinnamon bread!
Thank you

This place is a gem! From start to finish, the whole experience was wonderful. We have stayed at other Airbnb rentals and this one is at the top of our list! Banana bread in the kitchen, all of the items that you don’t have to shop for (paper products, condiments etc) the complete charm of the house…just loved it all! It’s hard to say what I liked most about the place, but, if I had to pick it's a toss up between the living room and the porch. So comfortable, so cozy! Enough room for everyone and we weren’t right on top of each other. Close enough to Main St. to walk easily and drive to surrounding stores to shop. We will definitely be back!

When women gather who have traveled far and wide the Airbnb accommodation needs to offer comfort, ease, and joy. Christina's place does all of that and more, just a short walk from the center of Keene but tucked into a peaceful historic neighborhood. Well-appointed and full of love is how I would describe this cozy oasis. I can not imagine any need that was not met.
Second stay was even better than our first. Great accommodations for our group.

Great house, walking distance to downtown. Lots of different spaces in the house. Quiet neighborhood. Would definitely stay here again. In fact, our family in Keene liked it and wanted to stay there too!
From the moment we walked in, it felt like home. Everything was well-kept and clean. We enjoyed the character and all the stylish touches. Great sleep. Great rest. Thank you!!
This house really feels like home. We will definitely be back!

Beautiful, warm and friendly home. I stayed here with seven other women for a training in Keene. We had plenty of room, plenty of hot water, good internet connection, fantastic kitchen to cook in together and best of all a fresh loaf of banana bread on the counter to welcome us! Christina gave us a few extra hours to depart which was so helpful and generous as they had guests coming in right after us! We would definitely stay again!

This is an excellent location. Very clean and well maintained. Well equipped. Heisting is an excellent host who responds quickly to requests and does everything to make for a comfortable stay. Highly recommend.
Wonderful convenient stay with everything we needed!
Second time staying here and the house was fantastic. Very clean, and welcoming! Plan on staying again in a month when I head back to Keene to visit my daughter! Thank you and highly recommend.

What a magical house! How lucky we were to find ourselves in the incredible home here in Keene. We ended up needing an extra home for our summer family reunion. As luck would have it, we stumbled on this incredible place and had the most wonderful week. Beds were comfy, the house was delightful, coffee on the screened porch was perfection and the brilliant hospitality of three sisters was the cherry on top! We can’t wait to come again.
The house is lovely, close to Keene, and Christina is very kind and easy to communicate with.
This was a great place to stay to call our home away from home. Very quiet as well at night for sleeping...great little town to see and explore....the accomodations were great...

We were in Keene for a family reunion and stayed in this lovely house with both children and grandparents. The house was beautifully decorated and maintained and was really perfect for us. The kitchen had everything we could possibly need, the house was stocked with cool books and games, and our kids fell in love with the awesome loft. The layout worked well for a larger group, as it allowed people to spread out and not keep each other awake. The screened-in porch was a great place to congregate, and the first floor bedroom and bathroom were good for an older person with limited mobility. The location is excellent - an easy, flat walk 10 minute walk into downtown Keene — and the hosts could not have been nicer or more responsive. We are all hoping to stay again for the next family reunion!

Christina's place was perfect. We had a six person group, there was plenty of room, just outside of town, everything you need to cook and grill, places to read, nice screened in porch, great outside space. If you are visiting Keene this place is awesome. Hope
To be back next year.
Extremely cozy and home-like

This place is an absolute gem! My family stayed there to celebrate my graduation. It was cozy, clean, beautifully decorated, and perfectly located. The home not only had everything we needed, but it offered the creature comforts that make choosing an AirBnB far better than staying in a hotel. I've already recommended this place to several of my friends and classmates that live in or near the area. It's too big for a couple, but perfect for a family getaway.
The home was just as described with ample sleeping arrangements. The hosts provided a welcome basket with a personal note for our family. Absolutely made our graduation weekend easy and enjoyable!

What a beautiful house! Very clean. Extremely spacious. Well decorated. Loved the open concept. How unique and comfortable it was to have the four bedrooms, four living room/den spaces, three bathrooms, two electric fireplaces, tons of counter space, and that one could walk from end to end through the first floor, up the stairs, through the second floor and down the back stair case. We didn’t cook during this visit but we sooo appreciated the fresh, local milk in the fridge waiting to greet a house full of coffee drinkers! There as a very nice welcome basket with snacks and wine. All instructions and house guide book was clear and easy to follow. We are looking forward to a return visit in one year!!
Beautiful stay! The house was perfect for our large group. Downtown is a 5 minute walk. We will be back again!
Much larger than it looks in the photos! What a great space to stay!

Ample, clean, wonderfully charming space to live in for a fall wedding nearby for all 12 of us, including 2 five year olds. The open space on the first floor was immaculate and accommodating to all of us at meal and relaxation times. Then the back room served us well for late night chats while the sleepers slept. BIG bedrooms. Really Nice furnishings throughout. So tastefully decorated throughout. All the amenities we needed and more. So much parking space (for 5-8 cars?) and two garage spots made in and out and security so easy. Beds were comfy. Lots of pillows, blankets, seats, TP, towels, etc. Lots of space / bathroom availability. Big fridge. Snacks! Coffee! Tea! Lots of stuff carefully and proactively provided. Very helpful and detailed binder.
This old farmhouse has a charm that left us all looking forward to our next visit!
Great stay - house was clean, had everything we needed and was a short walk from town!

We had a wonderful time at this AirBnb. Everything was as advertised. The place was clean, had everything we needed to cook (and I mean everything), and tons of space for me and my friends to enjoy. The hot tub was nice and clean. There was plenty of space to park. It was an easy 10 minute walk from downtown.
I highly recommend this place for groups or large families!

Pinhas is a gracious host. When we arrived, a lovely basket of fruits, snacks and wine were waiting for us. The house was emasculate and everything was easy to find. The location of the house was walking distance to the town and restaurants.
Pinhas was very accommodating. We loved our welcome basket! The kitchen was well stocked with glassware, bakeware and the like.
Very enjoyable. My family and I had a great time very clean and quiet. Close to the town. Would definetly return.

Close to restaurants and shops. Easy to feed a good size group.
Back stairs are too narrow to be really useful. And bathroom situation upstairs is a challenge if group is not all one family.
Awesome place! Can’t wait to come back next year!!
Place was spacious and perfect walking distance to downtown. Nice small yard to hang out in as well.
This was a lovely comfortable home! For my first air bnb experience it set the bar high! We had a great time for a relaxing group trip and enjoyed walking into town.
We absolutely loved the house and our stay in Keene this past weekend! Pinhas’s house was close to downtown and the house was immaculate. We would absolutely book again!

This house was such a pleasure to stay at. The house was clean and perfect for a large family trip. They were stocked with ever amenity possible and had lovely personal touches. The location was perfect walking distance to downtown as well. We would love to stay again!

We were a large group in town for a wedding and everyone agreed that this was one of the best airbnb stays! The house was spotless and the perfect layout for multiple couples.
Pini was incredibly responsive to questions before and during our stay. There were many thoughtful and generous touches … even a personal note with wine and snacks on the table when we arrived!
Everything was perfect!

We were in Keene for my daughters wedding in Walpole. We were 7 staying at the home and it was completely wonderful. We had a few local friends who were able to walk from their hotels, to the home, to visit after the long days. It is the perfect place for a group. Super unassuming from the street but walk in and it is perfection. Comfortable with plenty of room to spread out. We loved the outside covered seating area near the hottub. All the seating in the house was comfortable as were the beds. I am fussy where I stay when I get away from it all. All of us agree that we would run back to this home when we can. Main Street is a short walk to farmers market, coffee shops, restaurants and galleries. We already want to go back when we have more time to explore. The host was super responsive when I had a question! That is a huge plus. You will not be disappointed in this home.

What a wonderful stay! The home is impeccably clean, inviting, spacious, and charming. The hosts thought of everything - from a welcome basket, to a high chair for our baby, to a guide on some history of their house. We loved our weekend in the home, and it’s obvious the hosts take pride in it.
One of the reasons we decided on this house is because of its prime location to downtown. It’s a very short walk to all of the restaurants, cafes, and shopping. Yet it’s still quiet and serene. The perfect location, in a beautiful home, with very accommodating and gracious hosts.
(This house even converted my parents into liking the idea of Airbnbs - they were previously very skeptical.)
Very nice stay.
The house is beautiful, the hosts are responsive and we had a great experience.
Phenomenal spot! Great location and great space within the house
Wonderful spot in the heart of Keene. Plenty of stuff to do and room for 8+ easily.

My friends and I loved this home! It was spacious and great accommodations for a larger group. The location was wonderful and very walkable to downtown where there were many great restaurants, bars/breweries, etc. The hot tub was a great bonus too. It was a very beautiful and clean home with responsive/friendly hosts. We would certainly stay again!

This place was perfect for our group of 8 friends. The common areas are much bigger than pictured, with an open concept dining, kitchen and living room area and then a second living room with cozy fireplace down a hallway. The bedrooms were all big enough and beds all comfy. The hot tub was a must have for us and we were not disappointed. Quick walk to the heart of Keene for meals. The welcome basket was a lovely touch. Overall exceeded expectations!

The home was spacious and spotless. We had seven people in our group and still had an extra bed. The hot tub was fantastic, and the basketball hoop was nice to have too.
Pini was very kind and responsive. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a relaxing weekend in Keene.
Our family absolutely adored this home and location! Host was super friendly and the home was beautiful. The neighborhood was quiet and neighbors were friendly. Highly recommend this house!!
We had a lovely stay. The hot tub was a bit iffy... but everything else was perfect

I booked Pini and Hillary’s place to celebrate NYE and my 30th birthday with a group of 10 friends. We were so impressed by how large and functional the kitchen space was, as well as how many different communal spaces we had to sprawl out and enjoy. Pini and Hillary have truly thought of everything to make this stay as easy and as comfortable as possible and would absolutely recommend staying here for any large group visiting Keene!

I've stayed at many Airbnb's in the past few years, and I can honestly say this was one of the best! Everything was as described and/or better. Communication was A+. My co-workers and I were very comfortable, the neighborhood is incredibly quiet, and we all enjoyed our brief time in Keene.
Beautiful home within walking distance to town. Home furnishings were beautiful and beds were very comfortable. Plenty of space for family gatherings.

A gem of a house in Keene! Indoor and outdoor space aplenty for everyone to gather and when they need a bit of alone time. The house is appointed with everything you can think of, the house manual is thorough, and the hosts attentive. Easy walking distance to downtown Keene or a quick drive to other attractions in the area. This would be a perfect spot for Parent's Weekend or graduation celebration with lots of family coming in. Everyone loved our time here!

We had a large group -7 adults and a toddler- and we all had to get ready for a wedding. The house was perfect. Large enough for all of us and everything we needed was there - hairdryer, iron, steamer. It is in a great location- easy walk into town.
A beautifully finished and charming house in downtown Keene.
Great house and location! We loved staying here while in town for a wedding. Clean and cozy with large comfortable beds.

We stayed here with a large group and the house was perfect. It’s well laid out and perfectly stocked with everything we needed for the weekend. We couldn’t have asked for a better house for our group. We’ll certainly be back.
Wonderful stay in the beautiful quaint town. The hosts were very good at communicating.
This house is amazing!! Clean, spacious, and a great location in Keene.

Pini's home was even more lovely in person. There was a big welcome basket with all sorts of goodies waiting for us upon arrival. Check-in was extremely easy and pini was always very responsive when I had a question. The home is within walking distance of town, so we got to explore the area with ease. The house is full of anything you may need-- from toiletries to games! I highly recommend this home-- 10/10 would stay again!
Beautiful home, perfect for a larger number of people. Super clean and comfortable. Can’t get over the lovely patio. Would happily stay again!

We had a wonderful stay.
-great location quiet but easy to walk to town
-spotlessly clean
-furnished nicely and tastefully
- comfortable furniture and beds
-well equipped kitchen

Great house! I cook; fully and really well provisioned with all cooking needs. Quiet, clean, spacious and perfectly maintained. Excellent beds, bedding, showers and bath, private garage, and wonderful natural light throughout. Quick, easy, and effective communication with host. Walk to all bars and restaurants in town. Highest recommendation!

The Keene Farmhouse is perfect for family or business get together. The house was very comfortable and had everything we needed. Was close enough to walk into town and centrally located. We totally enjoyed our stay for the week!
would go back, beautiful property

This Air BnB was absolutely lovely. There's a convenient place to park, you're very close to down town, and you have access to a beautiful multi floor home. The rooms are spacious, the environment is quite comfortable and the hosts are perfect :)
I'd absolutely stay again!

In the words of my 14 year old - "This house is -Goals!"
I am pretty sure she means this house is set up and decorated beautifully and has a wonderful feel.
Beautiful Home with perfect location to downtown. Everything was clean and spacious. Would highly recommend this location if your in Keene.

Our stay was great! Pinhas and Hilary are excellent hosts, they were helpful and quick to communicate the entire time. The home is nicer than the pictures show. Everything is clean, organized, and well stocked. The location could not be better, it's less than a five minute walk to the main downtown area and numerous restaurants, cafes, bars, breweries and shops. I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone, thank you again!

We knew this would be a wonderful place but it far exceeded our expectations. It is incredibly roomy and everybody enjoyed their stay. The garage is a nice touch to keep the car away from the elements. The rainfall shower was amazing after a long drive and a day on the mountains and the place is filled with everything you could need from cooking/dishware to entertainment. The fruits, wine, and milk were very gracious gifts for us and it was greatly appreciated!
I could not recommend this place more! Pinhas was very responsive. I would be back here in a heartbeat if I am ever back in the area.

This house was amazing - even better than the photos. The hosts were gracious and very communicative. Everyone in our group loved our stay. If we make it back to Keene, this is absolutely the house we'll be staying in again. 10/10.
Great house! We’ll come and visit again

Extremely clean and spacious-yet-warm house. Pini and Hilary were amazing hosts - we loved the basket with treats they left us, and the few basics in the refrigerator (like milk and juice) that were an extremely welcomed touch when we got in late at night hungry and tired. They were very responsive and everything was clean, working and easy to use. Highly recommended!

A beautiful home with thoughtful and tasteful updates. Great character and location is within easy walking distance of downtown. The multiple sleeping options and living areas were perfect for our large family and provided plenty of private places and gathering spaces for all. Hosts were very responsive and seem to have thought of everything! Wonderful stay.
Such a quaint spot and surroundings were beautiful! It was such a peaceful stay and everything was so clean!
A++ property. Beautiful spot. Very clean. Highly recommend.
We enjoyed our stay. Thank you
Great stay!!
Absolutely wonderful, relaxing home. Very comfortable and adorable!

Celia's place, Heron Cove at Wilson Pond, was beautiful & very peaceful. It was an easy check-in process. Upon entering, I noticed how much bigger the inside looks from the outside. At the same time, it has a very cozy feel to it. Once we got settled, we looked for places close by that would deliver. Athen's Pizza did not disappoint. Papagallo's is another really great restaurant that's only a couple miles up the road. There were ducks that would come to visit every day, & a 2 person kayak to enjoy. I stayed there while there was a snow storm. Initially the internet went out, but it came back on later that night. Other than that, there were no problems with it. On Easter Sunday, I had a few family members over for dinner. Everyone wholeheartedly enjoyed themselves! The only thing that could have been better was the furniture. The beds are on the soft side, and the living room couch & chairs weren't very comfortable. Having the use of a washer/dryer was a major plus. I would stay again.
Celia's place was just as advertised and more! The views, the space, everything was perfect, neat and clean. We had everything we needed and then some! Can't wait to return!

Great views out back window. Loved having separate desk for computer. Light switches and kitchen cabinets and drawers are labeled, so it was very easy to find things. Convenient parking right outside front door. What to know: Streetlight keeps main bedroom from getting very dark. Second bedroom is open at ceiling to living room so sound travels. Entrance to second bedroom is at head of the bed, so need to walk very narrow path between bed and wall to get in and out. Floors between kitchen, dining room, and living room are at slightly different levels with very small ramps between each room. Had issues with wall HVAC unit in living room always blowing hot air even when set at cool, which will hopefully be resolved for next guest.
Such a special spot, can’t wait to be back again!

Josh was responsive, professional, and so helpful. We messaged via AirBnB, he called with updates and answers to our questions/needs, and when we ran into him in person, he was very personable. He even suggested a way to save us a few dollars when we needed to extend our stay.
Long story short, we spent three nights for around what one would have been in a hotel on Main Street, and enjoyed it immeasurably more. Better price, quality, and service for a great location that's historic and beautiful. We don't have enough good things to say about The Burrell House and its employees.

There were pros and cons to this place.
Pros: it was very clean and the A/C units kept it nice and cool, even in July. The location was perfect, only a 5-minute walk to the square in Keene. And there were 4 pillows on the bed, each a different kind and ranging from firm to soft, so you could pick which worked best for you.
Cons: the Wi-Fi kept going in and out, the mattress was very firm and not all that comfortable, the couch didn’t have any throw pillows or anything so it wasn’t comfortable to lounge on, there were ants in the kitchen, and there was no floor-length mirror, or any mirror that showed more than my head and shoulders. All in all, this place probably would have been fine for a night or two, but I was there for a week, and it wasn’t comfortable enough for that long.
