Very clean. Would definitely stay here again.
Excellent little spot, very comfy and well supplied.

The place is very adorable, quintessential New England style. My husband and I loved our stay here. It was very comfortable, and we felt right at home. It was super clean! The location is also great as it is close enough to downtown keene that it is walkable but tucked away for some peace and quiet. There are 2 rooms (one bedroom and 1 with a sofa bed) and there is a breakfast nook in the other room where the host generously provides all sorts of coffee, teas and snacks. The place had everything one would need. The checkout was super easy. Totally recommend! We would stay here again!

Nice New England setting. Two Private rooms upstairs. Wide pine floors and nice carpets. A pretty large living room space with coffee area at one end. And a nice bedroom. I’d stay here again. Felt like home.

This is a charming, cozy little one bedroom with an "attic apartment" type of feel. The steps are a little narrow and steep, might not be for an older guest or one with some mobility issues. The bathroom is spacious. I wasn't clear how many other units might be in the house, and whether guests were staying there, so I was a little hesitant to do my morning exercise routine on the older wood floors, not wanting to wake someone up early in the morning. I did it very quietly. There is a cute little kitchen area with a microwave and generous snacks, but a little dish detergent, kithen towel, and sponge for the bathroom sink might have helped for washing tea cups, spoons, and bowls. Overall I felt very comfortable there, and appreciate the super clean bathroom. Not too fancy, but just enough and just right!
Lovely little place. Very clean and accommodating. Will definitely be recommending to other Antioch students.
The apartment is lovely with many wonderful snacks and touches to make it feel like home. Thank you!
Very cute and extremely clean. The bed is super comfortable. No kitchen but there is a microwave and coffee maker. Great place to stay!
Our second stay with Padma and Liane - great accommodations and extras! They are wonderful hosts and the place remains peaceful and comfortable. We will stay again!
Padma's apartment is so comfortable and cozy. Thank you for the wonderful snacks and assortment of teas and coffee.
We loved this space. The hosts were very friendly communicative and the Airbnb was very clean and homey. We appreciated the coffee and the food that was provided and would definitely come back again!
What a lovely, quiet, and peaceful stay! The special thoughtful touches like oatmeal, coffee, tea, and snacks were really wonderful! Highly recommend this location!
Spacious and comfortable space, with lots of complimentary snacks :) Pleasant stay in between travel nursing shifts, thankful to the downstairs host who helped me figure out how to open the lock box!
Great location and spacious. Super comfortable bed, slept like a champ! Be aware stairs to place very steep and narrow so not good if you have mobility issues.

It was a pleasure to stay at Padma’s home. Her instructions for checking in were clear and thorough. This made our check in process very easy after a later than expected arrival. We were excited to see the nightlife attractions just five minutes down the road. The location is just a few minutes away from several stores while also being tucked away in a quiet area. The upstairs apartment was tidy and tremendously comfortable. Padma’s home was stocked with complimentary snacks and kitchen supplies. These came in handy and mirrored the convenience of a hotel room, lacking a kitchen but well equipped with coffee, tea, a microwave, coffee maker and electric kettle. We hope to visit NH again soon. Thank you for the wonderful accommodations!
Definitely recommend! Very close to downtown and about a 30 minute drive to Mount Monadnock.

The location was perfect for the training I was attending. It's also not far from town and a local park. We enjoyed our time there, but do think it would be best for short stays vs. the 7 days we were there. With no way to cook or wash dishes, it made it a bit challenging (personally not fans of washing dishes in the bathroom, but I suppose you could). The bowl of treats/snacks as well as coffee, tea, and a pitcher of filtered water were very much appreciated upon arrival. There is no TV, which I guess I didn't notice in the listing, but it wasn't a deal breaker. Decks of cards or more games would have been helpful to pass the time in the evenings so recommend bringing your own. We ended up buying cards to keep us busy.
It was relatively quiet and the bed was comfy. No problems sleeping for us! It is a lovely space to use as a home-base for exploring the area.
All good
Lovely and charming! The suite had everything I needed and was a great value, and Liane and Padma were so helpful and responsive Easy walk to downtown shops and restaurants. I highly recommend it!!
Padma's place is perfect, spacious, spotless, and comfortable, and a solid value.
Padma was a fantastic host. We were in frequent communication prior to our stay. The house was comfortable and exactly as advertised. It was roughly a 15-20 minute walk from the downtown area.
Fantastic space! Wonderful communication!
if I ever need an Airbnb here again, this'll be my first choice.
Better than I was expecting and hoped for.
Spacious, comfortable bed, great location. Would definitely stay again!
The rooms were very comfortable, private, and quiet in the evening. Close to everything!

We stayed here a year ago and liked it a lot, and came back a 2nd time. We totally enjoy the place. It's very clean and well-equipped and everything works amd there are enough electrical outlets and so forth. The location is very close to downtown Keene but is very quiet and peaceful. It's not modern, like most hotel rooms, but we find that charming, and we recommend it highly for the right people.
Very convenient, comfortable accommodation. Slept very well after a long day’s hiking. Appreciated the nice amenities. Thank you, Liane and Padma!
Nice quiet location
This spot is super cute, and the host is very easy to get in touch with. Quick walk to downtown and all the shops and restaurants!
Stayed at Padma’s place, so we could attend a family retirement party. Place was cozy, comfortable and very close to downtown Keene.
Great location, comfortable, clean, and so relaxing.

The suite is spacious and cozy. The location is good for walking to the nearby park (about 5 - 10 minutes), downtown (20-30 minutes). Walks are very pleasant. Keene is full of classic New Hampshire architecture. The house is in a quiet residential neighborhood.
Great location! Easy to walk places, quiet at night! Highly recommend.
Very comfortable and nice place. Hosts were excellent with communication making sure we had everything we needed.

Amazing, cozy, quiet retreat in the heart of Keene. So close to downtown and all the amenities, but so quiet! Hosts are lovely, with friendly and fast communication, and the suite is so well appointed, super clean, and SO comfortable - just an absolute gem. 5 stars, would definitely stay again!
Great experience. Padma and Liane were very responsive and all their communication was clear, timely and helpful. The space is very sweet and comfortable. Entry stairs are steep!
Beautiful old New Hampshire home. Clean and cozy. My host checked on me everyday via text to make sure I had everything I needed. I’ll return again soon I hope.
This is a lovely quiet place to stay with everything you need. There is no kitchen but is well stocked with coffee tea etc... Very comfortable and clean. Great place to stay!
Homey, New England space with a very easy check in process and quick to respond hosts! A perfect place to stay while visiting Keene and surrounding areas. I would book this place again!

This is really an incredible find for those seeking to visit Keene. The price is right, and the location is perfect. The rooms are clean, open and comfortable. My favorite part is I don't feel like an interloper is someone else's home. I don't feel like I'm taking up space, and I am rarely aware of the fact I'm sharing the home with the owners. I highly recommend staying here even if you're just planning an overnight stay in the Monadnock area.

Padma’s space is gorgeous. So easy to get downtown—we walked both nights. The suite is so roomy and also cozy. She was so welcoming without being overbearing. Everything was wonderful. She went truly above and beyond—down to including coffee and yogurt for breakfast. I have absolutely nothing but good things to say about my stay.

Wonderful stay. Very cozy and very clean. Plenty of room. Private and comfortable. Great communication with hosts. Felt very safe here. Walked to town as well. Delicious snacks provided and good coffee! I loved the nice bathtub. I would recommend to anyone considering staying. I will be booking again in the future.
great place, great location, great host

Don’t hesitate to book this spot, it was one of our best experiences with Airbnb. I appreciated having two separate rooms since I’m an early riser and my husband likes to sleep a little longer than I do. Having our own thermostat also was nice since we like things on the cooler side. Lots of thoughtful touches, snacks, drinks, yogurt, coffee, etc. feels like home, very charming and cozy. We never left to explore the town, so we will be back. A great place to unwind and take a break from life. Clean, quiet, comfortable bed. Perfect!

This was out second stay, and what a lovely stay it was. My husband and I felt relieved to spend time in this quiet and cozy living space during the holiday excitement. As before, the mini fridge was stocked with a few treats; teas were provided as well as a Brita filter and an electric kettle. We had plenty of room to spread out and get comfortable. Every room was spotless and furnished- speaking of which a new mattress had been installed! We slept in perfect comfort and security. I highly recommend staying here should you need a place in Keene! Better than any local hotel as far as I've experienced.
Lovely place, hugs the edge of town, and comfortable and welcoming environment for a very fair price. Would absolutely recommend!
Super cosy airbnb.

This was a perfect stay for my husband and I. It has a private entrance and staircase that leads up to an adorable set of rooms on the second floor. There's more than enough space for two people. The rooms were CLEAN. I couldn't find a speck of dust or grime anywhere. The amenities left included coffee, a Keurig, and even yogurt in a mini fridge. The heat was easy to adjust for comfort, and the shower had plenty of soaps and shampoos. The bed was comfortable, even though it sank a smidge in the middle, and the dark curtains allowed us to either keep the room dark or let in the readily available natural light. It was also quiet, allowing us to recharge after a long day. The energy was great as well. We were both very comfortable in the old house, and hope to return in the future.
Beautiful, peaceful place to stay. I would definitely stay here again.
Padma’s place had everything I needed. Very comfortable and quiet which was lovely.
The place was exactly as described and pictured. Location is amazing, and comfortable space for a weekend in NH. Hosts are great with communication, smooth check in process.

We chose to stay in Keene in order to have relatively easy access to Vermont, New Hampshire and Massachusetts for the Fall foliage. We made a good choice as Padma’s place proved to be convenient for our journey. This is a good place if you want to enjoy quiet and peaceful surroundings while still being a 5 minute drive away from downtown Keene.
Padmas location was beautiful, clean, spacious and conveniently located! Would definitely book again!
The location is ideal for Keene and nearby locations.
The accommodations were sparkling clean and very charming. Wonderful communication and flexibility on the part of the hosts. Highly recommend.
Good place to stay in Keene! With a reasonable distance to downtown/mount monadnock.

This is a charming upstairs apartment with lots of room. It's an easy, 15 min. walk into downtown Keene, a beautiful place with good options for meals & a top-notch ice cream joint. I give Padma & Liane's airbnb two thumbs up.
Wonderfully cozy place to stay. This was the perfect retreat after my hike up Mt Monadnock. Liane and Padma are fantastic communicators and hosts. Highly recommend!
Padmas place was very nice and well located, I had a very nice experience staying there and would definitely stay there again!

The space for us was great. The hosts very helpful and responsive. We would definitely return. (Stairs would be challenging for people with hip or knee issues.) A charming and comfortable space for us.

Excellent spot for the quirky, random town that is Keene. I was here for a disc golf tournament/vacation, and the place suited me perfectly. It certainly has a lot of character - vintage and charming. The A/C units in each room were nice and bed was comfortable. I enjoyed the tub as well. No TV, so I brought my laptop and streamed Netflix/Amazon. I would stay here again if visiting Keene.

The Cottage was a delightful, peaceful accommodation. I arrived at midnight and was welcomed into the cottage with no problems. I found the bed comfortable and the living room area charming. There was a coffee machine for fresh coffee. Plenty of towels and linen.
I would definitely stay there again. Hopefully, next year!
Thank you Padma

Liane was our contact person and was very responsive , friendly and helpful. The apt was spacious, quiet and a great location to the Keene downtown area. The ONLY downside is if you want a meal in the apt., the kitchenette has no sink/running water, but this was not a deal-breaker for us. great accommodations, great hosts, great location!

Was perfect for us and Liane was a great host. It was very comfortable, clean, and close to the place I had my meeting and the downtown area. It was so nice to have a separate living room. So much better than a hotel. I will stay here again next time I'm in town.
The place was excellent and the host was very accommodating and friendly.
Great private space within walking distance to downtown.

This is a pleasant place to stay with easy access to town and easy access to a park that you can walk in. Literally the park is a 2 to 3 minute walk and downtown is a 5 to 10 minute walk. Everything is clean easy check in, quiet and a very enjoyable stay. I plan to stay here again if it’s available when I come back.

The place was clean, well stocked and very tastefully decorated. The hostess communicated well, was unobtrusive and things were as described. The antiques, somewhat steep stairs and wide-planked floors give this a definite old (yet modern) New England feel.
At one point, in my head, I described the place as a bit quirky, but after visiting the home of friend in Keene, I realized that this place was Keene Quirky, which is almost exactly the reason for using AirBnB. This is an experience and not just a place to stay.
For us, it was a very pleasant experience.
I had a very nice stay, they were very communicative and accommodated my late arrival to the area. I would recommend this location for your stay in Keene, close to anything you need in the city.
Great experience; highly recommended!
This was a nice clean apartment with friendly hosts in a convenient location.
Very tidy, beautiful suite with all the essentials and located in a gorgeous college town. great value.

An affordable, comfortable, and spacious rental within walking distance of a lovely park and short driving distance from downtown Keene. The open and quick communication on the host's part additionally benefits the Airbnb experience.

Arrived to find two type written pages of rules for staying there. One stated there was no parking on the street or you would be ticketed, so I was told to park in the drive way which was one lane, and required that I leave my car keys in the hallway in case someone needed to move my car. Also, stated in her rules that she reserves the right to enter the apt when guest is not home to adjust the thermostat. There was only a slide lock on the apt door for security which was loose and difficult to use. I immediately packed up and left feeling very uncomfortable with the whole situation.

Plz don’t come here was told to leave because I had a child and 2 family members stop by. I was in town for a funeral and had to pack up and leave with my child by 11 am the next morning and she claimed there was 100$ for a refund but was not there and have not got a refund
